name: Ensure Invisible Index is not used
description: This rule checks if any Invisible Indexes exists in Oracle Database(s).
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: PostgreSQL does not support Invisible Indexes
remediation: Currently, Aurora PostgreSQL does not provide a directly comparable alternative for Oracle Invisible Indexes.
remediationSample: Remove INVISIBLE indexes or replace them with normal indexes.
alternativeName: Ensure Invisible Index is not used

technicalCriteria.name: Cloud Migration - Oracle Database to Amazon Aurora
